en: [Letter] 1837 Feb. 24, Washington [D.C., to] County Court Clerk of Jefferson County, Tenn[essee] / W[illia]m B. Carter

This is a letter dated February 24, 1837 from William B. Carter to the clerk of the county court of Jefferson County. Carter writes that he is sending the clerk a copy of proceedings of the House of Representatives.

This is a letter dated February 24, 1837 from William B. Carter to the clerk of the county court of Jefferson County. Carter writes that he is sending the clerk a copy of proceedings of the House of Representatives.

none: [Letter] 1837 Feb. 24, Washington [D.C., to] County Court Clerk of Jefferson County, Tenn[essee] / W[illia]m B. Carter : page 1

body.value: Washington 24th Feby February 1837 Sir I take the Liberty of sending to you the Journal of the proceedings of the 14 Reps Representatives with a request that you deposit the same in yr your office, for the inspection and use of the citizens of Jefferson county . I have the Honor to be Very respectfully yr ob servt your obedient servant Wm William B Carter To the clerk of the County Court of Jefferson County E. East Tenn
